Class GameState

java.lang.Object
  GameState
public class GameState
extends Object

This class implements a structure to keep track of a Missile Command game's state. Care must be taken to ensure that multiple threads do not modify the same state instance at the same time.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Tobias Salem, alias Vassago

Field Summary
 LinkedList buildings
          A list of all currently active (alive) buildings in the game.
 LinkedList explosions
          A list of all currently active explosions in the game.
 LinkedList missiles
          A list of all currently active missiles in the game.
 LinkedList playerClicks
          A list of all unprocessed clicks by the player.
 float power
          The player's current power level.
 int score
          The player's current score.
 int worldHeight
          The height of the game world (in pixels).
 int worldWidth
          The width of the game world (in pixels).
 
Constructor Summary
GameState()
          Creates a new instance in which all the public fields are initialized to default values, except for worldWidth and worldHeight.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

missiles

public LinkedList missiles
A list of all currently active missiles in the game. Each element of this list should be a Missile instance.

explosions

public LinkedList explosions
A list of all currently active explosions in the game. Each element of this list should be an Explosion instance.

buildings

public LinkedList buildings
A list of all currently active (alive) buildings in the game. Each element of this list should be a Building instance.

playerClicks

public LinkedList playerClicks
A list of all unprocessed clicks by the player. Each element of this list should be a Vector2D instance. The coordinates are relative to the users view of the game, i.e., (0,0) is in the lower left and positive x and y coordinates go the right and left, respectively.

score

public int score
The player's current score.

power

public float power
The player's current power level. Should be between 0 and 1, inclusive.

worldWidth

public int worldWidth
The width of the game world (in pixels).

worldHeight

public int worldHeight
The height of the game world (in pixels).

Constructor Detail

GameState

public GameState()
Creates a new instance in which all the public fields are initialized to default values, except for worldWidth and worldHeight.
